description:
Nobita is weak in studies and to pass the exams he need to solve a question. Doremon is also not giving him any gadgets so he is asking your help. You are given **n** non-negative integers representing an elevation in map where the width of each bar is *1*. Find how much water it can trap after raining.

#### Input Format: 
- first line contains n (size of the array)
- second line contains n elements of the array

#### Output Format:
- Print an integer

#### Constraints: 
- 1 <= n <= 20000
- 0 <= height[i] <= 10^5
title: Filling Rain Water
